EmailTemplate.description: Email to customers when their portal goes live
EmailTemplate.name: Portal is Live
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Community Solar Portal Is Now Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your BlueWave Portal is now live! Login to your BlueWave Portal to:
• View your statements • Make payments and view your payment history • Sign up for autopay
Click the link below and login using the username, {!Receiving_User.Username}. If this is your first time logging into the BlueWave Portal, please click the link to create a new password.
Login To Your Portal Here
Thanks for joining the wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
